Description: Ostracon, fragment of the body of a red-brown pottery vessel, the fabric is grey in section, the interior is slightly grooved and spotted with a dark-brown resinous deposit, the exterior is covered with a red-brown slip and remains of two lines of Coptic text written in black ink, smudged.
Curator's comments: To be published by J. Cromwell
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (393313) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/393313)
